We believe that multi-functional teams work better when everyone is T-shaped.', 'Be a strong participant in the Spotify-wide web developer community affecting and driving web engineering across the company.', 'Be a technical leader within your immediate team and within Spotify in general.', 'Hack on new insights during regular hack days and the yearly Spotify-wide hack week!', 'You are experienced in building distributed, high-volume Java backend services. job_title: Full Stack Engineer - Data & Insights (Remote Eligible - Americas)
job_text: ['Find jobs', 'Company reviews', 'Find salaries', 'Employers', 'Create your resume', 'Change country🇺🇸 United States', 'Help Center', 'Contribute to ML Home - a web application built on Backstage that helps Machine Learning practitioners and their teams collaborate on the end-to-end delivery and management of ML products. On the backend of ML Home is a central metadata and metrics infrastructure that enables collecting and retrieving data from various ML platform components.', 'Deliver a cohesive user experience by understanding our users as well as components of Spotify’s ML platform.', 'Deliver scalable, testable, maintainable, and high-quality code.', 'Share knowledge, promote standard methodologies, and collaborate with some of the worlds best engineers.', 'Work in an environment that supports your individual growth by providing you with exciting work, the freedom to acquire new skills via hack weeks, reading groups, and a variety of internal training courses.', 'You have experience building APIs and client libraries used by multiple engineering teams and have worked with protocols like gRPC, REST GraphQL.', 'You are knowledgeable about data modeling, storage, access techniques and have production experience with the following (or an equivalent): Postgres, Mysql, Bigquery.', 'Have extensive experience writing modern Java. Python experience is a plus.', 'You have some experience with modern web development, particularly JavaScript, TypeScript and React.', 'Demonstrate an interest in Machine Learning.', 'You are passionate about code quality, continuous delivery, automated testing.', 'You have a preference for participating in end-to-end product development lifecycle: user research, product discovery, coding, testing, deployment, monitoring, and user feedback.', 'You demonstrate a growth mindsetー you welcome challenges, seek feedback from others, show perseverance on long-term goals, and generally go above and beyond in your work.', 'Value team success over personal success.', 'We are a distributed workforce enabling our band members to find a work mode that is best for them!', 'Where in the world? For this role, it can be within the Americas region in which we have a work location and is within working hours.', 'Working hours? We operate within the Eastern Standard time zone for collaboration and ask that all be located in that time zone.', 'Prefer an office to work from home instead? Not a problem! We have plenty of options for your working preferences. Find more information about our Work From Anywhere options here.', 'Hiring Lab', 'Career Advice', 'Browse Jobs', 'Browse Companies', 'Salaries', 'Find Certifications', 'Indeed Events', 'Work at Indeed', 'Countries', 'About', 'Help Center', '© 2021 Indeed', 'Do Not Sell My Personal Information', 'Accessibility at Indeed', 'Privacy Center', 'Cookies', 'Privacy', 'Terms']

We believe that multi-functional teams work better when everyone is T-shaped.', 'Be a strong participant in the Spotify-wide web developer community affecting and driving web engineering across the company.', 'Be a technical leader within your immediate team and within Spotify in general.', 'Hack on new insights during regular hack days and the yearly Spotify-wide hack week!', 'You are experienced in building distributed, high-volume Java backend services. job_text: ['Find jobs', 'Company reviews', 'Find salaries', 'Employers', 'Create your resume', 'Change country🇺🇸 United States', 'Help Center', 'US work authorization (Required)', 'Working with other engineering, product, operations, marketing, and other leaders to help drive value and set priorities.', 'Leading and developing a growing team of data engineers.', 'Building, maintaining, and fulfilling a technical data engineering roadmap vision.', 'Driving architectural direction, with a secure, scalable platform.', 'Helping teams scope and complete successful project plans around key business initiatives.', 'Ensuring new functionality is built with effective and scalable technologies, knowing when to diversify and leverage existing tech.', 'Implementing systems tracking data quality and consistency.', 'Owning the core company data pipeline, scaling up data processing flow to meet the rapid data growth at Nav.', 'Developing tools supporting self-service data pipeline management (ETL)', 'You know how to implement, advocate, and teach Agile practices, and adapt them to your people and circumstances.', 'Your Passionate about work completion. Never leaving the work at a half-cooked point or near-completion without proper closure.', 'You know and understand data ethics & privacy.', 'You can consistently evolve data models & data schema based on business and engineering needs.', 'You know how to use SQL and Python job tuning to improve data processing performance.', 'You have helped build custom data models and applications to empower data science and BI in decision making and customer experience.', "You've developed and extended design patterns, processes, standards, frameworks and reusable components for use in various data engineering functions and areas.", 'An authentic and relatable mentor who can challenge their team to do their best work every day.', 'Strong SQL, ETL, scripting and or programming skills with a preference towards Python', 'You’ve lead small teams of other engineers.', 'You know at least one of the SQL languages (SQL Server, MySQL, Postgres, etc.) extremely well.', 'You know at least one scripting language (Python, Ruby, etc.) extremely well.', 'You have experience with workflow management tools (Airflow, Luigi, etc.)', 'You’re comfortable working directly with all data consumers at Nav (BI, Data Scientists, etc.).', 'You have a BS or MS in Computer Science or related technical field.', 'You know a thing or two about Ruby, Rails, Rack, JavaScript, and PostgreSQL.', 'Extensive experience with Python', 'Experience with Airflow', 'Experience with CI/CD', 'Experience optimizing queries in AWS Redshift and/or Postgres', 'Experience deploying and maintaining AWS EC2 and Docker instances', 'Experience with getting financing and understanding credit scores', 'We look at the future and say “why not”; we see possibilities where others see problems or routines. We show the way ahead and are committed to achieving ambitious goals.', 'We practice straight talk and listen generously to each other with empathy. We value different opinions and point of views. We ensure that we connect outside as well as inside to learn from others and inspire each other.', 'We hold ourselves accountable for delivering results. We choose to not to be a victim of circumstance. We make decisions & take responsibility so that we can act & support each other, rather than adopting defensive, and “finger pointing” behaviors.', 'As leaders we motivate & engage our teams to undertake beyond what they originally thought possible, by developing our teams & creating the conditions for people to grow and empower themselves through enabling & coaching.', '401(k)', 'Dental insurance', 'Disability insurance', 'Employee assistance program', 'Employee discount', 'Flexible schedule', 'Flexible spending account', 'Health insurance', 'Health savings account', 'Life insurance', 'Paid time off', 'Parental leave', 'Referral program', 'Retirement plan', 'Vision insurance', 'Monday to Friday', 'Fully Remote', 'www.nav.com', 'Remote interview process', 'Virtual meetings', 'Hiring Lab', 'Career Advice', 'Browse Jobs', 'Browse Companies', 'Salaries', 'Find Certifications', 'Indeed Events', 'Work at Indeed', 'Countries', 'About', 'Help Center', '© 2021 Indeed', 'Do Not Sell My Personal Information', 'Accessibility at Indeed', 'Privacy Center', 'Cookies', 'Privacy', 'Terms']

job_title: Field Engineer, Global Data Center Connectivity
job_text: ['Find jobs', 'Company reviews', 'Find salaries', 'Employers', 'Create your resume', 'Change country🇺🇸 United States', 'Help Center', 'Service Delivery - Assure delivery and maintenance of all structured cabling and connectivity, on time, within budget, and to industry leading standards of quality and reliability.', 'Vendor Field Management – Develop and scale our partners responsible for all run ops, construction, and data center improvement activities on site. Work with key partner leaders to monitor the progress, and the quality of installation within our data centers.', 'Quality Assurance - Perform ongoing quality audits to assure vendor work meets DCC quality standards prior to turn-over and throughout the lifecycle of the data center. Review, comprehend, and implement work as shown in the contract documents. Able to review drawings and report back discrepancies (Proactive Quality Control).', 'Technical Subject Matter Expert (SME) – Serve as technical lead for industry and Facebook structured cabling standards, product selection, design, and installation methods in the field. Partner with global design and engineer team to support design reviews, BOM reviews, and as-built drawing validations.', 'Logistics – Coordinate with design teams as a material SME for all materials questions and estimates.', 'Documentation - Assure site as-built design documentation is complete and up-to-date.', 'Operations - Oversight of the Run Operations team for detailed turn-up schedule, moves, adds and changes and setting project priorities. Assure rapid responses to high priority builds and break-fixes.', 'Strategic Planning – Participate in project pipeline planning and discussions related to the data center.', 'Process - Support development of best practices and initiatives, coordinating SOPs/SIPs with vendors, and participating in global and regional standards. Assist in developing or identifying network cable/rack/cabinet installation processes and standards.', 'Communications - Assure crisp oversight and clear communications across an array of platforms with cross functional partners and vendors. Proactively communicate progress and project risks and initiatives to key stakeholders.', 'Safety – Ensure vendor is following site, OSHA and EHS safety standards.', '6+ years direct experience in fiber optic and structured cabling installation.', 'Experience overseeing vendors work and suppliers towards the same project goals.', 'Experience analyzing, understanding, and interpreting data.', 'Interpersonal experience, and experience connecting with and influencing stakeholders with different objectives.', 'Experience in a mission critical environment requiring coordination across multi-disciplines for delivering a goal.', 'Experience with inside plant cabling (ISP).', 'Experience reviewing design documents and specifications.', 'Experience leading people or project teams.', 'Proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite of tools.', 'Experience thinking strategically and acting tactically.', 'Proficiency with design and construction software such as PlanGrid, Bluebeam, and BIM360.', 'Experience in a run-ops environment.', 'Hiring Lab', 'Career Advice', 'Browse Jobs', 'Browse Companies', 'Salaries', 'Find Certifications', 'Indeed Events', 'Work at Indeed', 'Countries', 'About', 'Help Center', '© 2021 Indeed', 'Do Not Sell My Personal Information', 'Accessibility at Indeed', 'Privacy Center', 'Cookies', 'Privacy', 'Terms']

job_title: Senior Staff Engineer - Tanzu Data Services - Opportunity for Working Remotely Philadelphia, PA
job_text: ['Find jobs', 'Company reviews', 'Find salaries', 'Employers', 'Create your resume', 'Change country🇺🇸 United States', 'Help Center', 'You have seen the effectiveness of empowered, balanced teams and believe in Outcomes over Output.', 'You have strong leadership instincts, and have an appreciation for systems thinking and understanding of lean startup, agile and software delivery methods.', 'You believe in doing the right thing and doing what works.', 'You will be the engineering, architecture-focused leader on the Balanced Leadership Team (Product Management, Engineering Management, Technical Leadership) for the Data Services organization within the Modern Applications business unit.', 'This group is focused on developer-centric products and frameworks. Your role will encompass the oversight of engineering and architecture across the product lines of Operational and Analytical Databases, Caching, Messaging and Streaming. Our goal is to drive towards a set of common foundational data services for Tanzu.', 'Technical Leads are fundamentally force multipliers and through collaborative influence they help us make better decisions, particularly as we contemplate decisions that are hard to reverse. They build networks and harvest context across multiple programs so they can ask questions like “Have you thought about X?” or “Did you know Team Y solved this problem using X?”', 'Leading the Data Services organization with technical acumen, architecture and best practices. To be clear, this is a leadership role but not a management role.', 'Providing a Framework and Vision for teams to coalesce around to build and distribute context', 'Ultimately responsible for ensuring a sense of shared context on the architecture across the organization.', 'Distilling the vast technology possibilities down to concrete priorities', 'Being a force multiplier - Building a bench of engineers through mentorship and example', 'Working at a organization-level with leadership, product leads, technical leads, designers, and people managers in figuring out how to prepare for future work and promote context on current and future design.', 'Bringing clarity where there is uncertainty, managing risk and continuously delivering value.', 'Advocating for and helping create consistent/repeatable process. Making the appropriate tradeoffs between understanding requirements, architecture/design and ensuring quality implementation to deliver against the business goal', 'You will report to the VP of Engineering in the Data Services MAPBU organization.', 'You will focus on all products, frameworks and systems that support these themes in the Data Services organization, currently 5 programs. The four products are: Tanzu Greenplum, Tanzu SQL, Tanzu Gemfire and Tanzu RabbitMQ.', 'You will foster the growth of the existing technical leads assigned to each program and hire new leads as the business grows.', 'You will engage regularly with cross-organization technical leads in developing R&D standards in context sharing, process and enablement of our engineering efforts.', '10+ years Engineering experience, especially with large scale, distributed technical solutions. Experience with data products is ideal', 'Exposure navigating large enterprise organizations with an understanding of IT partnerships', 'Demonstrable experience of discussing large scale systems, emerging technologies and innovation.', 'Able to decompose complex problems into sets of smaller, manageable tasks.', 'Strong leadership and communication skills and the ability to mentor others', 'Ability to work collaboratively with others and navigate complex decision-making', 'Demonstration of applying systems thinking to solve organizational problems.', 'Ability to collaborate well with engineers, designers, and other partners', 'Experience with Agile development methodology (such as Extreme Programming) and/or experience with development methodologies suitable for large, community-driven OSS projects.', 'Comfortable with ambiguity. We work in an iterative and incremental way, balancing many different inputs and constantly making trade-offs.', 'Comfortable working with a globally distributed team. We have engineers across the Americas, Europe, China and India.', 'We believe that teams should spend more of their time delivering incremental value and less on building infrastructure.', 'We’re building platforms, tools, and automation, including Tanzu Application Service, Tanzu Kubernetes Grid, and Tanzu Mission Control, to enable our customers to easily and confidently develop and run the software that powers their business.', 'Hundreds of companies rely on our platform to meet the needs of millions of their customers.', 'Our engineers adopt appropriate processes as a way to go fast forever and deliver remarkable results.', 'Our product managers and product designers work side-by-side with our engineers in small, empowered teams, using Lean and UCD as guides.', 'We measure success by making our customers more productive, as both software developers and service operators. We spend time with our customers to understand and build empathy for the jobs that they need to get done.', 'Employee Stock Purchase Plan', 'Medical Coverage, Retirement, and Parental Leave Plans for All Family Types', 'Generous Time Off Programs', '40 hours of paid time to volunteer in your community', "Rethink's Neurodiversity program to support parents raising children with learning or behavior challenges, or developmental disabilities", 'Financial contributions to your ongoing development (conference participation, training, course work, etc.)', 'Hiring Lab', 'Career Advice', 'Browse Jobs', 'Browse Companies', 'Salaries', 'Find Certifications', 'Indeed Events', 'Work at Indeed', 'Countries', 'About', 'Help Center', '© 2021 Indeed', 'Do Not Sell My Personal Information', 'Accessibility at Indeed', 'Privacy Center', 'Cookies', 'Privacy', 'Terms']

Panel schedules would be an example of a specialized report.', 'The contractor shall configure, implement and provide training associated with DCOI (DataCenter Optimization Initiative) and RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) asset management solutions.', 'The contractor shall plan the installation of mainframe and Open Systems equipment; to include all facility related activities, i.e. power, cabling, air circulation, etc.', 'The contractor shall develop detailed mainframe migration plans to include a step-by-step approach to the relocation and delivery of hardware systems and equipment to the computer room, according to timeframes and parameters established by the customer project schedules.', 'The contractor shall develop complete site preparation documents for designated raised floor areas.
